<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/tags/{tagId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update a tag

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"tagId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Tag ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Tag name (1-50 characters)"},"color":{"type":"string","description":"Hex color code (e.g.,"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Tag updated successfully"},"400":{"description":"Validation error"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden - Insufficient permissions"},"404":{"description":"Tag not found"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
